sqlMap.select: SELECT addr.id, addr.id_person, addr.type, tel.address, '' as city, '' as zip, '' as country, tel.preference, tel.type as tipoTelematica FROM scr_address addr RIGHT JOIN scr_addrtel tel ON addr.id=tel.id
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO scr_addrtel (id, address, type, preference) VALUES (#id:INTEGER#, #direccion#, #tipoDireccionTelematica.id:INTEGER#, #principal:INTEGER#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM scr_addrtel WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM scr_address WHERE id_person=#value:INTEGER#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE scr_addrtel SET address=#direccion#, type=#tipoDireccionTelematica.id:INTEGER#, preference=#principal:INTEGER# WHERE id=#id:INTEGER#
UPDATE scr_addrtel SET preference=0 WHERE preference=1 AND id IN (SELECT id FROM scr_address WHERE id_person=#id:INTEGER#)
UPDATE scr_addrtel SET preference=1 WHERE id=#id:INTEGER# AND id IN (SELECT id FROM scr_address WHERE id_person=#tercero.id:INTEGER#)
